name: Hell's Burger (Unfinished)
description:
Unfinished prototype for a restaurant simulator game.

The game will start with 4 microgames collecting basic resources, then the player will use basics to create advanced recipes but that most important part is not in this build and menus are broken.

External resources used:

https://henrysoftware.itch.io/pixel-food
